quotes.text: I am in a charming state of confusion
quotes.author: Ada Lovelace

quotes.text: the question has not settled as to if madness is the loftiest intelligence
quotes.author: Edgar Allen Poe

quotes.text: Oh, you can't help that,” said the Cat: “we're all mad here.
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: Curiouser and curiouser!
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: "I don't think..." then you shouldn't talk, said the Hatter.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.text: The question has not yet settled as to whether madness is or is not the loftiest intelligence
quotes.author: Edgar Allen Poe

quotes.text: I'm afraid I can't explain myself, sir. Because I am not myself, you see?
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: If you don't know where you are going any road can take you there
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: “Well, I never heard it before, but it sounds uncommon nonsense.”
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: Yes, that's it! Said the Hatter with a sigh, it's always tea time.
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: It would be so nice if something made sense for a change.
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: No wise fish would go anywhere without a porpoise.
quotes.author: Lewis Caroll

quotes.text: If you lay down with dogs, you get up with fleas.
quotes.author: Mozzie, White Collar

quotes.text: Realists don't fear the results of their study.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.text: His heart is a suspended lute; As soon as you touch it, it resonates.
quotes.author: Edgar Allen Poe

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: May you live in interesting times.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: May you find what you are looking for.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: May you get more than you bargained for.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Paranoia is a skill, the secret to longevity.
quotes.author: Mozzie, White Collar

quotes.text: We feel free when we escape, even if it be but from the frying pan into the fire.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.text: There are many things of which a wise man might wish to be ignorant.
quotes.author: Ralph W Emerson

quotes.text: It's goodbye, but we lean forward to the next crazy venture beneath the skies.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.text: You’re a collection of impeccable, elaborate masks in orbit of a stunted heart.
quotes.author: Verna, House of Usher

quotes.text: The reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Great Spirits have often encountered violent opposition from weaker minds.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Bureaucracy has a vestes interest in creating the chaos in which they exist.
quotes.author: Richard Nixon

quotes.text: language in its highest expression is musical
quotes.author: Verna, House of Usher

quotes.text: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: A wise man once said, it's fun to do the impossible.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Love is a temporary madness. It erupts like an earthquake and then subsides.
quotes.author: Louis de Bernières

quotes.text: Perfection is the antithesis of authenticity.
quotes.author: Mozzie, White Collar

quotes.text: A careless word may kindle strife
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A cruel word may wreck a life
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A timely word may lessen stress
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A loving word may heal and bless
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A bitter word may hate instill,
quotes.author: T.J. Bach

quotes.text: A brutal word may smite and kill
quotes.author: T.J. Bach

quotes.text: Flame is a fickle mistress.
quotes.author: Mozzie, White Collar

quotes.text: Everything good must one day come to an end.
quotes.author: Mozzie, White Collar

quotes.text: Sacred cows make the best hamburger.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Without leaps of imagination, you lose the excitement of possibility.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.text: Behind every worst-case scenario, there's a worse worst-case scenario.
quotes.author: Mozzie, White Collar

quotes.text: He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Fear gives intelligence even to fools.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.text: Give a man a mask and he'll show you his true face.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Most of us know how to say nothing; few of us know when.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The easy way to teach children the value of money is to borrow from them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: No individual raindrop ever considers itself responsible for the flood.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Time heals almost everything.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Those who don't believe in magic will never find it.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.text: If you can't stand the heat, get out of the kitchen.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.text: It is better to try and fail than fail to try.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A journey of a thousand li starts with one step.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: People don't buy what you do; they buy why you do it.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for.
quotes.author: John A. Shedd

quotes.text: Never half-ass two things, whole-ass one thing.
quotes.author: Ron Swanson

quotes.text: Vulgarity is no substitute for wit.
quotes.author: Violet Crawley

quotes.text: I think, therefore I am.
quotes.author: René Descartes

quotes.text: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: What we think, we become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
quotes.author: Louis Hector Berlioz

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Live people ignore the strange and unusual, I myself am strange and unusual
quotes.author: Lydia Deetz

quotes.text: Veronica you look like hell. Yeh? I just got back
quotes.author: Veronica Sawyer

quotes.text: How am I supposed to recover when I don't even understand my disease?
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: Everything that makes your heart beat faster is beautiful
quotes.author: Thomas Andre

quotes.text: How am I supposed to recover when I don't even understand my disease?
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: How am I supposed to recover when I don't even understand my disease?
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: What is imagination?... It is a God-like, a noble faculty. It renders earth tolerable, it teaches us to live, in the tone of the eternal.
quotes.author: Ada Lovelace

quotes.text: If you can't give me poetry, can't you give me "poetical science"?
quotes.author: Ada Lovelace

quotes.text: I don't wish to be without my brains, tho' they doubtless interfere with a blind faith which would be very comfortable.
quotes.author: Ada Lovelace

quotes.text: I never am really satisfied that I understand anything; because, understand it well as I may, my comprehension can only be an infinitesimal fraction of all I want to understand about the many connections and relations which occur to me, how the matter in question was first thought of or arrived at, etc., etc.
quotes.author: Ada Lovelace

quotes.text: Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.
quotes.author: Alice

quotes.text: If I had a world of my own, everything would be nonsense. Nothing would be what it is, because everything would be what it isn't. And contrary wise, what is, it wouldn't be. And what it wouldn't be, it would. You see?
quotes.author: Alice

quotes.text: Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.
quotes.author: Alice

quotes.text: Curiouser and curiouser!
quotes.author: Alice

quotes.text: If everybody minded their own business, the world would go around a great deal faster than it does.
quotes.author: The Duchess

quotes.text: Alice: How long is forever? White Rabbit: Sometimes, just one second.
quotes.author: White Rabbit

quotes.text: Contrariwise,' continued Tweedledee, 'if it was so, it might be; and if it were so, it would be; but as it isn't, it ain't. That's logic.
quotes.author: Tweedledee

quotes.text: I knew who I was this morning, but I've changed a few times since then.
quotes.author: Alice

quotes.text: "Where should I go?" - Alice. "That depends on where you want to end up."
quotes.author: The Cheshire Cat

quotes.text: Alice asked the Cheshire Cat, who was sitting in a tree, “What road do I take?” The cat asked, “Where do you want to go?” “I don’t know,” Alice answered. “Then,” said the cat, “it really doesn’t matter, does it?”
quotes.author: The Cheshire Cat

quotes.text: How long is forever? Sometimes just one second
quotes.author: White Rabbit

quotes.text: You're mad, bonkers, completely off your head. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best people are.
quotes.author: The Mad Hatter

quotes.text: Sometimes the only way to stay sane is to go a little crazy.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: Was insanity just a matter of dropping the act?
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: When you’re sad you need to hear your sorrow structured into sound.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: As far as I could see, life demanded skills I didn't have.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: Every window in Alcatraz has a view of San Francisco.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: I was trying to explain my situation to myself. My situation was that I was in pain and nobody knew it, even I had trouble knowing it. So I told myself, over and over, You are in pain. It was the only way I could get through to myself. I was demonstrating externally and irrefutably an inward condition.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: With wild eyes that had seen freedom.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: When I was supposed to be awake, I was asleep. When I was supposed to sleep, I was silent. When a pleasure offered itself to me, I avoided it.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: There is thought, and then there is thinking about thoughts, and they don't feel the same.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: My family had a lot of characteristics - achievements, ambitions, talents, expectations - that all seemed to be recessive in me.
quotes.author: Winona Ryder (Susanna Kaysen)

quotes.text: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I— I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: They were deliberating amongst themselves as to how they could give wings to death so that it could, in a moment, penetrate everywhere, both near and far.
quotes.author: Bishop John Amos Comenius

quotes.text: Glory isn't that simple
quotes.author: Ye Xiu

quotes.text: People see me and think I'm weak. They want to take care of me. But I can take care of myself, by myself.
quotes.author: Toph Beifong

quotes.text: I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it!
quotes.author: Toph Beifong

quotes.text: The ruling elite have been carrying out secret nuclear war for the purpose of depopulation since World War II under the guise of atmospheric testing 'for the national security,' nuclear power 'too cheap to meter' and depleted uranium 'kinetic energy' bullets
quotes.author: Leuren Moret

quotes.text: The world is full of kings and queens, who blind your eyes and steal your dreams.
quotes.author: Leuren Moret

quotes.text: Signs and symbols rule the world, not words nor laws.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: I foolishly once believed the myth that  nuclear energy is clean & safe. That myth has completely broken down. Restarting nuclear reactors while we still have no place to dispose of nuclear waste is a criminal act toward future generations.
quotes.author: Morihiro Hosokawa

quotes.text: The public is wonderfully tolerant. It forgives everything except genius.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: A book must be the axe for the frozen sea within us.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Elegance is a physical quality… If a woman doesn’t have it naked, she’ll never have it clothed.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.text: Genius is nothing but childhood recovered at will.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: A leader is best when people barely know he exists, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say: we did it ourselves.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: Fate is like a strange, unpopular resturant filled with odd little waiters who bring you things you never asked for and don't always like.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: Wicked people never have time for reading. It's one of the reasons for their wickedness.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: Reading is one form of escape. Running for your life is another.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: It is a curious thing, but as I grow older, I find that I am more and more inclined to think that the best thing in life is to be a little mad.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: It is a curious thing, the death of a loved one. We all know that our time in this world is limited, and that eventually all of us will end up underneath some sheet, never to wake up. And yet it is always a surprise when it happens to someone we know. It is like walking up the stairs to your bedroom in the dark, and thinking there is one more stair than there is. Your foot falls down, through the air, and there is a sickly moment of dark surprise as you try and readjust the way you thought of things.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: People aren't either wicked or noble. They're life chef salads, with good things and bad things chopped and mixed together in a vinaigrette of confusion and conflict.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: Everyone should be able to do one card trick, tell two jokes, and recite three poems, in case they are ever trapped in an elevator.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: I suppose I'll have to add the force of gravity to my list of enemies.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: If writers wrote as carelessly as some people talk, then adhasdh asdglaseuyt[bn[ pasdlgkhasdfasdf
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: When someone is crying, of course, the noble thing to do is to comfort them. But if someone is trying to hide their tears, it may also be noble to pretend you do not notice them.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: All the secrets of the world are contained in books. Read at your own risk.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.text: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.text: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: In all the heavens and the earth, I Alone am the Honored One.
quotes.author: Satoru Gojo

quotes.text: Moral arguments? I hate moral arguments. Assigning reasons and responsibility to strength is what those who are weak tend to do.
quotes.author: Satoru Gojo

quotes.text: You're lucky if you can die a normal death after running into a curse.
quotes.author: Gojo Satoru

quotes.text: What kind of idiot picks on the strong?
quotes.author: Gojo Satoru

quotes.text: Perception, communication... every action associated with living is forcibly repeated an infinite number of times. It's ironic, isn't it? When granted everything, you can't do anything.
quotes.author: Gojo Satoru

quotes.text: I'm suprised you thought you could beat me using your sorry excuse for a brain.
quotes.author: Gojo Satoru

quotes.text: Don't worry, I'm The Strongest.
quotes.author: Gojo Satoru

quotes.text: Dying to win, and risking death to win are completely different.
quotes.author: Gojo Satoru

quotes.text: It's unforgivable to steal the youth away from kids.
quotes.author: Gojo Satoru

quotes.text: There are many types of monsters in this world, monsters who will not show themselves and who cause trouble. Monsters who abduct children, monsters who devour dreams, monsters who suck blood, and monsters who always tell lies. Lying monsters are a real nuisance. They are much more cunning than other monsters. They pose as humans, even though they have no understanding of the human heart. They eat, even though they've never experienced hunger. They study even though the have no interest in academics. They seek friendship even though they do not know how to love. If I were to encounter such a monster, I would likely be eaten by it because, in truth, I am that monster.
quotes.author: L Lawliet

quotes.text: If you use your head even sweets wont make you fat.
quotes.author: L Lawliet

quotes.text: I don’t play fair, I’m a dishonest, cheating human being who hates losing in truth.
quotes.author: L Lawliet

quotes.text: To defeat evil, I must become a greater evil
quotes.author: Lelouch Vi Britannia

quotes.text: If the king doesn’t move, then his subjects won’t follow.
quotes.author: Lelouch Vi Britannia

quotes.text: If strength is justice, then is powerlessness a crime?
quotes.author: Lelouch Vi Britannia

quotes.text: Yes... I... Destroy the world... and create it... anew.
quotes.author: Lelouch Vi Britannia

quotes.text: Regardless, what I want is tomorrow!
quotes.author: Lelouch Vi Britannia

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Stars always shine brightest seconds before they fall apart.
quotes.author: Nikita Gill

quotes.text: You wanted your file, I found you your file. You wanted out, I got you out. You needed money, I found you some. I'm fucking consistent. I told you the truth. I didn't write it down in a fucking book! I told you to your face. And I told Daisy to her face - what everybody knew and wouldn't say, and she killed herself. And I played the fucking villain, just like you wanted.
quotes.author: Lisa Rowe

quotes.text: You're just jealous, Lisa... because I got better... because I was released... because I have a chance... at a life.
quotes.author: Daisy Randone

quotes.text: And my favorite part... it has a sign right outside that says, "If you lived here, you'd be home now."
quotes.author: Daisy Randone

quotes.text: Chaos was the law of nature; Order was the dream of man
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.text: I write differently than I speak, I speak differently than I think, and I think differently than from the way I ought to think, and so it all proceeds into deepest darkness.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.text: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Oh, the teeniest feather could knock me in the gutter
quotes.author: Lorelai Gilmore

quotes.text: No prison can hold me; no hand, leg irons or steel locks can shackle me. No ropes or chains can keep me from my freedom.
quotes.author: Harry Houdini

quotes.text: People will come to love their oppression, to adore the technologies that undo their capacities to think.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: People are frugal in guarding their personal property; but as soon as it comes to squandering time, they are most wasteful of the one thing in which it is right to be stingy
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: I'll make real sandwiches. Big ones a man can sink his teeth into and use both hands to hold 'em.
quotes.author: Charlotte Flax

quotes.text: While asleep, I had an unusual experience. There was a red screen formed by flowing blood, as it were. I was observing it. Suddenly a hand began to write on the screen. I became all attention. That hand wrote a number of elliptic integrals. They stuck to my mind. As soon as I woke up, I committed them to writing.
quotes.author: Ramanujan

quotes.text: No self-respecting architect leaves the scaffolding in place after completing the building
quotes.author: Gauss

quotes.text: Your scientists were so preoccupied with whether or not they could, they didn't stop to think if they should
quotes.author: Dr. Ian Malcom

quotes.text: You are a lazy, self-indulgent little girl who is driving herself crazy
quotes.author: Valerie Owens

quotes.text: Omar Khayyam also came to the Vizier...but not to ask for title or office. 'The greatest boon you can confer on me,' he said, 'is to let me live in a corner under the shadow of your fortune, to spread wide the advantages of Science, and pray for your long life and prosperity.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.text: What has been done, thought, written, or spoken is not culture; culture is only that fraction which is remembered.
quotes.author: Gary Taylor (The Clock of Long Now)
